dooyit.storage

Class StorageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.storage.StorageController

  • public class StorageController
extends java.lang.Object
    The StorageController class provides methods and attributes necessary for loading and saving categories, tasks and custom css. It also contains methods to change the storage location and save the user's preferences
    Author:
    Dex
